content: this pattern calls for aran-weight yarn but i ve also made it in worsted-weight yarn it ends up a little narrower and you have to add a few row to the ribbing at either end of the piece my teenaged daughter loves wearing knitted headbands though they are probably more decorative than functional in the cold canadian winter **feb 1 2009 update** please note that a correction number of cable repeats has been made to the pattern **jan 13 2011 update** ravelry member ignia has created a very useful chart showing all the pattern stitches you can find a link to it in this blog post 1 1 http //ignia ru/2011/01/10/hi-there/
